name: Tap n Catch
description:
Tap the screen to catch the dot.
Don't make a mistake or you will have to start from the beginning.
Collect stars to unlock new dots.

How many dots can you collect?
How far will you go?

Game features:
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Collect stars
- Unlock dots
publishers: Warlock Arts Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
